ArgonTest.Name: Module proof implies
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
sealed trait IsEven (n: Int) <: Object end
class ZeroIsEven <: IsEven 0 public def new() end end
class TwoIsEven <: IsEven 2 public def new() end end
proof def zeroIsEven: IsEven 0 = ZeroIsEven.new()
proof def twoIsEven (requires z: IsEven 0): IsEven 2 = TwoIsEven.new()
proc printEven(n: Int) (requires even: IsEven n): () = puts (n.to_s())
proc main(): () do printEven 0 printEven 2 end
